extendedInfo.description: Bold food demands a bold app! With our new app, you can find a Chiliâs restaurant, browse the menu, get coupons, and even order To-Go directly from your app! Youâre never too far from a Chiliâs and now itâs easier than ever to order To-Go!- Find a Chiliâs using your current location, by Zip Code, or by City & State. - Get Maps & Driving Directions to Chiliâs. - See Chiliâs featured items & coupons. - Browse Chiliâs full menu. - Order online for To-Go service. - Sign up for the Chiliâs Email Club to be notified of current deals, promotions, and new menu items. - Follow us on your favorite social networks like Facebook & Twitter. - Scan QR codes in the restaurant with a new built-in code scanner.- NEW updated homepage â easier to find what youâre looking for- Maps update - allows use of your native map application

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work in Alexandria
reviews.comment: This would be a very nice tool, if it worked.  I live in a major metropolitain area on the out-skirts of the nation\'s capital, yet this app has yet to be able to connect to \"Chili\'s Service\".  I always have to use my PC to place an order.
reviews.author: Doug Kaye

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good application
reviews.author: Doug Reppen

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: Use it all the time. No issues and even lets me customize my orders.
reviews.author: mike mcpherson

reviews.title: My Local Chili\'s has never heard of this App.
reviews.comment: Did an order then went in to pick up and they had no clue what I was talking about.  This doesn\'t work in Grand Junction Colorado. Would give it zero stars if that was possible.  I put in my zip code and my Local Chili\'s came up but they didn\'t know about it.  So sad.
reviews.author: Meredith Weidner

reviews.title: Grade A Horseshit
reviews.comment: Looking for a location in \"Frederick, MD\" and it returns \"Sorry online ordering not available in your area.\"  Meanwhile the web version returns locations close to there.  So what is the point of the app.   Stupid programmers and I doubt Chilis management even try the app out.  Bunch of Maroons!
reviews.author: Jeff Holicky

reviews.title: Lacking a certain spice...
reviews.comment: I was expecting a LOT more from this app.  I wanted to see nutritional info, and most of all, COUPONS.  Almost every week there are coupons posted on FB and/or Twitter.  It would be nice for them to all be collected here instead of me having to search through FB and Twitter on my phone to find the current one when I\'m there eating.   Also I am a member of the Chilihead Nation, it would be nice if that was integrated into the app.  I\'ll keep this app around in case I travel and want to find a Chili\'s.  I hope it gets updated/upgraded to be more useful.    PROS:   can find a Chili\'s based on my current location, can call that Chili\'s with a click. Integrated QR scanning app Can send Chili\'s e-gift cards from the app  CONS:   no coupons no menu unless I pick a specific Chili\'s location and choose online order no nutritional info place order function doesn\'t seem to work (loads forever) No \"directions\" button for locations (even if it linked to an online map place that would be helpful) Chilihead nation not represented
reviews.author: Bert Piedmont

reviews.title: Good App, but request.....
reviews.comment: 1st use of app: would likely get 5 stars if it allowed for notes/special instructions for the entree. Maybe allow # of characters to input request (example, my spouse didn\'t want seasoning on his grilled salmon)...had to call the restaurant after order was placed- waste of time then :(
reviews.author: Lauren Shockey

reviews.title: Cool concept, but lacking
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app as a member of the Chilihead Nation. I found that I enjoyed the link to the videos, I also think it\'s great that you can send an e-certificate using this app. It was great at featuring the new menu selections. However, there are several disadvantages. First of all, I wish that the e-card feature would also allow you to add credits from your own e-cards and use it like a phone debit e-card. Most disappointing, is that it will not show a menu or allow me to online order for any of the restaurants in Hawaii.
reviews.author: Giggy nakayama

reviews.title: never works
reviews.comment: i have to constantly reload takes 30 mins to order then doesn\'t even send the order in
reviews.author: Annie Ward

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: Great restaurant! Poor App...come on Chili\'s you can do better! Will not help you locate a Chili\'s unless you know zip, just tells me i cannot order online! and where is the basic menu? While traveling would be nice for app to find nearest Chili\'s.
reviews.author: Todd Fugate

reviews.title: Yummy
reviews.comment: Yummy
reviews.author: lori fossum

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Westley Patrick

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Stopped accepting input halfway through trying to place order. Had to call in. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Brian Robinson

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Useless again. I\'ll never eat at this restaurant again.
reviews.author: Tommy Collum

reviews.title: Hot
reviews.comment: Love Mexico
reviews.author: Bobbi Coglizer

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do 1/2 of what it promises
reviews.comment: There is no access to coupons & specials, when I click place an order, none of the restaurants within 20 miles of me accept online orders. Doesn\'t seem to link with my already being in the chilihead or whatever the club is. I will just save some time & google chili\'s before I go out.
reviews.author: Brandi Fielders

reviews.title: Keyboard bug
reviews.comment: While typing in the phone number the keyboard keeps switching back to qwerty from numerical (after typing in each number)
reviews.author: Rohit Kundalkar

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app its my fave place to eat they always fix my order quick and it always delicious !!!!
reviews.author: Jessica Ellenburg

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: If I cant look at the menu to me pointless
reviews.author: Alison Johnson

reviews.title: What is this?
reviews.comment: Quite simply, love Chili\'s, hate the app. The developer of the app should be on bathroom duty permanently.
reviews.author: Victor A. Colon
